title: Why AMD Ryzen 3rd Gen & Zen 2 Should Get You VERY Excited!
description: AMD's 3rd generation Ryzen processors are almost being launched and in this video we go over some of Ryzen 3 and Zen 2 features and possible performance. There's A LOT to get excited about.    Visit Memory Express:    Available on Amazon:  Toshiba RC100:   Ryzen 7 2700X:  Ryzen 5 2600X:  ASUS TUF X470:   MSI B450 Tomahawk:    Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Toshiba and Memory Express. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (via Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #ryzen3rdgen #zen2 #hardwarecanucks #amd7nm
